org.sd.cluster.job
Class ClusterizingJobDataDirectory

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.cluster.job.AbstractJobDataDirectory
      org.sd.cluster.job.ClusterizingJobDataDirectory
All Implemented Interfaces:
JobDataDirectory
public class ClusterizingJobDataDirectory
extends AbstractJobDataDirectory

A job data directory for accessing file data by absolute path to be transferred as input to another job.

Author:
Spence Koehler
